00032 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00033 {
00034     if( argc < 2 ) {
00035         cerr << "No filename given" << endl
00036              << "cpp-gen-md5 [common-string] [shared-filename] [filename1 define1] [filename2 define2]* ..." << endl
00037              << "Generates a md5 sum from the lexical tokens of a C++ ignoring directives and whitespace." << endl
00038              << "If only a filename is given, will output a 16 byte string" << endl
00039              << "If both filename and define are given will output #define @define2@ \"@md5hash@\"" << endl;
00040         return 2;
00041     }    
00042     
00043     vector<char> vbasedata;
00044     vbasedata.resize(strlen(argv[1]));
00045     if( vbasedata.size() > 0 ) {
00046         memcpy(&vbasedata[0],argv[1],vbasedata.size());
00047     }
00048     if( strlen(argv[2]) > 0 ) {
00049         getTokenData(argv[2],vbasedata);
00050     }
00051     for(int i = 3; i < argc; i += 2) {
00052         vector<char> vdata=vbasedata;
00053         string md5hash = getmd5hash(argv[i],vdata);
00054         if( md5hash == "" ) {
00055             return 1;
00056         }
00057         if( i+1 < argc ) {
00058             cout << "#define " << argv[i+1] << " \"" << md5hash << "\"" << endl;
00059         }
00060         else {
00061             cout << md5hash << endl;
00062         }
00063     }
00064     
00065     return 0;
00066 }
00067 
00068 void getTokenData(const char* fname,vector<char>& vdata)
00069 {
00070     // Read the input file into a buffer.
00071     FILE* f = fopen(fname, "rb");
00072     if (!f) {
00073         cerr << "Cannot open input file: " << fname << endl;
00074         return;
00075     }
00076     
00077     fseek(f, 0, SEEK_END);
00078     int const size = ftell(f);
00079     fseek(f, 0, SEEK_SET);
00080     vector<char> buf(size);
00081     size_t read = fread(&buf[0], 1, size, f);
00082     fclose(f);
00083     if( read == 0 || read != size ) {
00084         return;
00085     }
00086 
00087     cpp::clearstate();
00088     cpp::lexer_iterator first(cpp::NewLexer(&buf[0], &buf[0]+buf.size(), fname));
00089     cpp::lexer_iterator last;
00090 
00091     while (first != last) {
00092         cpp::Token const& token = *first;
00093         switch(token.id) {
00094         case cpp::Unknown_token:
00095         case cpp::Directive_token:
00096         case cpp::EOL_token:
00097         case cpp::EOF_token:
00098         case cpp::Comment_token:
00099             break;
00100         default:
00101             vdata.push_back(token.id&0xff);
00102             if(  token.id&0xffff00) {
00103                 vdata.push_back((token.id>>8)&0xff);
00104                 vdata.push_back((token.id>>16)&0xff);
00105             }
00106             vdata.push_back((token.id>>24)&0xff);
00107             //cpp::PrintToken(token);
00108             if( (token.id&cpp::TokenTypeMask) == cpp::OperatorTokenType ) {
00109                 break;
00110             }
00111             if( (token.id&cpp::TokenTypeMask) == cpp::IdentifierTokenType ) {
00112                 if (token.id < cpp::Kwd_last) {
00113                     break;
00114                 }
00115             }
00116             for(size_t i = 0; i < token.text.size(); ++i) {
00117                 vdata.push_back(token.text[i]);
00118             }
00119         }
00120                
00121         ++first;
00122     }
00123 }

00125 string getmd5hash(const char* fname, const vector<char>& vbasedata)
00126 {
00127     vector<char> vdata = vbasedata;
00128     vdata.reserve(vdata.capacity()+10000);
00129     getTokenData(fname,vdata);
00130 
00131     md5_state_t state;
00132     md5_byte_t digest[16];
00133 
00134     md5_init(&state);
00135     md5_append(&state, (const md5_byte_t *)&vdata[0], vdata.size());
00136     md5_finish(&state, digest);
00137     char hex_output[16*2+1]; 
00138     for (int di = 0; di < 16; ++di) {
00139         sprintf(hex_output + di * 2, "%02x", digest[di]);
00140     }
00141     return string(hex_output);
00142 }
